content: // first/last n columns in column set df.select { dfs().take(3) } df.select { dfs().takeLast(3) } // all except first/last n columns in column set df.select { dfs().drop(3) } df.select { dfs().dropLast(3) } // filter column set by condition df.select { dfs().filter { it.name.startsWith("year") } } // exclude columns from column set df.select { dfs().except { age } }
